On Thursday , Jeh Johnson , Secretary of Homeland Security , discussed future plans to re-examine the controversial immigration enforcement program Secure Communities .
Johnson appeared on PBS ' NewsHour  where he said that , since March 13 , he 's been reexamining immigration enforcement , including taking a fresh look at Secure Communities .
